lead_paragraph: The iPhone or iPod Touch can act as an electronic book reader. Lexcycle’s Stanza program, available free in the Books section of the iTunes App Store, displays electronic books and articles in the iPhone or Touch screen in an easy-to-read (and adjustable) format. Pages can be turned with the flick of a thumb. Thousands of free e-books from Project Gutenberg and other sources are available to download wirelessly. More information about Stanza is at www.lexcycle.com. J. D. BIERSDORFER

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Turn Your iPhone Into an e-Book
